thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 02 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-CPI Property Group Announces ‍Terms And Conditions Of A Buy-Back Offer

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-CPI Property Group Announces ‍Terms And Conditions Of A Buy-Back Offer
text:
March 2 (Reuters) - CPI PROPERTY GROUP SA:‍​
* ‍TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF A BUY-BACK OFFER BY COMPANY​
* ‍PROPOSES TO PAY A PRICE OF TWENTY EUROCENTS (EUR 0.20) PER SHARE PRESENTED TO OFFER​
* ‍MAXIMUM NUMBER OF SHARES TO BE REPURCHASED CANNOT EXCEED 1,000,000,000 SHARES​
* NUMBER OF SHARES CONCERNED: EACH SHAREHOLDER CAN PRESENT TO OFFER UP TO 8.57% OF ITS SHAREHOLDING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
